definition: deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]

sentences.english: The feasibility of using quadropole mass spectroscopy to differentiate helium and deuterium was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论和测量如何利用质谱计来分氦和氘。

sentences.english: Cold fusion has been investigated by the electrolytical method and the deuterium absorption method.
sentences.chinese: 采用电解法和氘气吸附法研究了冷聚变现象。

sentences.english: The rings are opened with hydrogen chloride and deuterium chloride.
sentences.chinese: 应用氯化氢和氯化氘打开沅环。

sentences.english: Deuterons absorbed in the palladium lattice would form a sublattice in non-equilibrium state.
sentences.chinese: 钯晶格中所吸附的氘会形成处于非平衡态的次晶格。

sentences.english: 14 seconds later, the temperature became 3 billion degrees, forming the first deuterium atom.
sentences.chinese: 14秒后，温度是30亿度，第一个氘原子核形成了。

sentences.english: A self-displacement gas chromatography (SDGC) system using two columns packed with Pd was fabricated for deuterium enrichment.
sentences.chinese: 采用双钯柱自置换色谱法建立了1套氘浓缩实验装置。

sentences.english: If you could merge deuterium with deuterium, you gain energy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能把氘和氘合并，你得到能量。

sentences.english: If you could merge deuterium with deuterium, you gain energy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能把氘和氘合并，你得到能量。

definition: tritium 3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
protium 1H/light hydrogen, the most common isotope of hydrogen, having no neutron, so atomic weight 1
tritium/3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
